title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 54.5 - Filing and approval of variable life insurance policies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 54.5 - Filing and approval of variable life insurance policies

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by the superintendent, the filing and approval requirements applicable to individual general account life insurance policies shall, to the extent appropriate, be applicable to individual variable life insurance policies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
54.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
